headline: Akamai Technologies (AKAM): Valuing the Stock After Its Next-Gen Security Partnership With Seraphic Security
summary: Akamai Technologies (AKAM) just announced a major partnership with Seraphic Security to weave secure enterprise browser functionality directly into its lineup of Zero Trust security tools. This move is all about helping companies keep up as their employees access private apps, SaaS tools, and new AI features from practically anywhere. The collaboration aims to address the new web and AI-driven security threats organizations are facing, resulting in less hassle for IT teams and tighter...

headline: Akamai Is Recognized as a 2025 Gartner Peer Insights™ Customers' Choice for Online Fraud Detection
summary: Akamai Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: AKAM), the cybersecurity and cloud computing company that powers and protects business online, has been named a Customers' Choice in the August 2025 Gartner Peer Insights™ "Voice of the Customer" for Online Fraud Detection. Akamai was the only vendor to receive this distinction in the report.

headline: No Free Crawls: Akamai, TollBit, and Skyfire Turn Traffic into Revenue
summary: Akamai Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: AKAM), the cybersecurity and cloud computing company that powers and protects business online, today announced technical alliances with TollBit and Skyfire to give publishers and content owners multiple options to monetize AI bot traffic.
